#

Keras :brain: Cortex

Keras Implementations of Goal-driven models of (parts of) cortex## Currently Supported Architectures### :eye: Visual Cortex| Architecture | Paper | Original Implementation ||--------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|| CORNetZ | https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/408385v1 | https://github.com/dicarlolab/CORnet || CORNetS | https://papers.nips.cc/paper/2019/hash/7813d1590d28a7dd372ad54b5d29d033-Abstract.html | https://github.com/dicarlolab/CORnet |
